description.index: Vanja Gavrić is a web developer specializing in front-end. He also enjoys shooting photos and occasionally writes about gadgets. Loves to write about himself in third person.
description.playground: Vanja Gavrić is a web developer specializing in front-end. This is his playground.

header.scrollDown: Scroll down to learn more about me

articleDeveloper.skillsExplanation: Language / framework / tool agnostic. Choice of tools depends on the given job.
articleDeveloper.developerText: Web development is my passion. I enjoy translating user-centric design into web applications that users love while developing, testing and deploying production-quality code.

articlePhotography.title: I like to shoot photos
